title: Clear night, slow city driving with 9 braking events
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a city street at night, with other cars and pedestrians around.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to ensure safety and avoid collisions with other vehicles or pedestrians.
